select music.* from music_song music
AND music.song_name like concat('%',#{songName},'%')
AND music.album_id in (select id from music_album album where album.album_name LIKE concat('%',#{albumName},'%'))
AND music.singer_id in (select id from music_singer singer where singer.singer_name LIKE concat('%',#{singerName},'%'))
ORDER BY music.comment_count DESC
